title: Studded Leather
contents: text | Made from tough flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes

title: Shortsword
contents: description | Finesse | Use your choice of Strength or Dexterity modifier for attack and damage rolls.
description | Light | When you duel wield light weapons, you can use a bonus action to attack with your off hand without adding ability mods to the damage.

title: Shortbow
contents: description | Range | When attacking a target beyond normal range, you have disadvantage on the attack roll. You can’t attack a target beyond the weapon’s long range.
description | Two-Handed | Requires two hands when you attack.

title: Thieves’ Tools
contents: text | This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers.
text | Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.

title: Bone Dice
contents: text | This item encompasses a wide range of game pieces, including dice and decks of cards (for games such as Three-Dragon Ante).
text | If you are proficient with a gaming set, you can add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play a game with that set. Each type of gaming set requires a separate proficiency.

title: Potion of Healing
contents: text | The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.
